//: The Module field defines which module the SCEJSON will use.
///: The Data JSON Object holds all of the data required for the

Data.//: This loan illustrates the essential elements of the Loan module:

Advances.//: Specify when the advance (Proceeds, or Amount requested) and

AccrualConfigs.//: Specify the interest accrual configuration: when interest
AccrualConfigs.//_: begins to accrue, the rate and the accrual code (see manual
AccrualConfigs.///: for a complete list of accrual codes). We will use accrual

PmtStreams.//: Define when the payment stream begins and the number of
PmtStreams.//_: computed payments. Monthly payments are assumed.
